summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Villa Paris gestionale event menu functionality. All core features working correctly including CRUD operations for portate, varianti selection, reordering, and data persistence.
passed_tests: Varianti selection - toggle on/off varianti buttons (vegetariano, senza_glutine)
Add portata - clicking 'Aggiungi Portata' button creates new portata card
Edit portata nome - input field works correctly
Edit portata descrizione - textarea works correctly
Reorder portate - move up/down buttons work properly
Delete portata - trash button removes portata successfully
Save menu - clicking 'Salva Menu' persists data to API with success message
Data persistence - reload page and verify saved data loads correctly
Backend API - all CRUD operations working (GET, PUT events with menu data)
Menu notes functionality - text area saves and persists data
Multiple portate management - can add, edit, reorder multiple portate
UI responsiveness - all buttons clickable and interactive elements working

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI interactions and data persistence working
